message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping for a price closer to my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $150?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $165? It's still a great price for this amazing product!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $150?
Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $160? It's still a great deal for this fantastic product!
